description: Sample Forget Check Data for HR-SM System

data.reason: Forgot to check in due to urgent meeting with client. I arrived at the office at 8:30 AM but had to immediately attend to a client call that lasted until 9:15 AM.
Left for urgent doctor appointment, forgot to check out. Had to leave immediately at 5:45 PM for a medical emergency and forgot to complete the check-out procedure.
System was down when I arrived at the office. The card reader and mobile app were both experiencing technical difficulties during my arrival time.
data.rejectionReason: Request submitted too late (beyond 7-day limit). Please submit forget check requests within 7 days of the incident.

data.reason: Had to leave immediately for family emergency. Received urgent call about family member's hospitalization and had to rush to the hospital.
Arrived early for project deadline, forgot to check in. Was focused on preparing for important presentation and overlooked the check-in procedure.
Left early due to illness, forgot check-out procedure. Started feeling unwell during the afternoon and had to leave early for medical attention.
Had to rush to emergency meeting, forgot to check in. Manager called for urgent client issue resolution meeting immediately upon my arrival.
Forgot to check out after working late on project. Was working on critical project deliverable and lost track of time, left without checking out.
Card reader was not working at main entrance. Tried multiple times but the system was not responding, had to use alternative entrance without check-in facility.
data.rejectionReason: Conflicting attendance record already exists. System shows you were already checked in at 8:55 AM through the side entrance.

data.reason: Left with manager for client meeting, forgot check-out. Accompanied manager to important client presentation at their office location.
Had to attend to family emergency, forgot check-in procedure. Received urgent call from family member and was distracted during arrival process.
Had to rush to catch last bus, forgot to check out. Public transport schedule was changed due to holiday season and had to leave earlier than usual.
Network issues prevented mobile check-in. Office WiFi and mobile data were both experiencing connectivity problems during arrival time.
data.rejectionReason: Multiple similar requests in short period. This is your third network-related forget check request this month.

data.reason: Attended off-site meeting, forgot to check out first. Was called to urgent meeting at client location and left directly from office without checking out.
Was helping colleague with urgent task, missed check-in. Colleague needed immediate assistance with system issue and I got involved right after arriving.

notes: All dates are in YYYY-MM-DD format
Reasons must be at least 10 characters long
Employee references should match existing user emails
ApprovedBy and RejectedBy should reference HR or Admin users
Status can be: pending, approved, rejected
